title: All Victorious Skins for Everyone at end of Season for Gold and Up
body:
Hello Guys! So I wanted to know if you guys are willing to help get Victorious Skins for everyone who get to Gold 5 and Higher. Since some are starting League Of Legends and are ranking to Gold 5 and higher, should they also get the Victorious skins from the seasons before? Victorious Jarvan 4, Janna, Elise, and Morgana would be yours. Well, here is your chance to get that opportunity. Please share this discussion with everyone you know that would like to get the skins! Thank You for your help, and please share for the Victorious skins.
Please let us know what Victorious skins that you guys like the best and best luck on the Summoner' s Rift!

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Just wanted to pop in here - we don't have plans  to unlock previous Victorious skins at this time. 

While it may not feel great for new players that they can't obtain something like Victorious Elise, these skins were given out as an achievement for players who reach Gold+ in each season. If you look at it in terms of a trophy of sorts, it'd feel bad for those who earned a 2011 trophy seeing the same trophy being given out in 2015. 

We've been working to create more options for new players to collect something that's 'exclusive' such as the First Strike loading screens for the PROJECT skins.
Please don't change your minds on this. Victorious skins should continue to show off veteran status, not how much money someone has to spend.
Yes, I agree with this 100% even though I only have the 1 from S3 and never use Elise xD

I think your statement clashes with the way Riot just decided to unlock a skin for every single player in League for Kayle, and it's also a rare, unavailable to buy one..
Not that I am complaining, but Kayle mains might.
To be fair, this thread is necro'd, and what I said was 12 months ago. We aren't opposed to changing/revising what we think is a good choice. :)

Do you consider giving Victorious skins the CS-Riven treatment?
You know adding a bit off stuff to the ones who originally got them while also making them avaliable for new players?
It's currently not something we're considering.
ffs, I never notice it..
Would we have a chance to get the skins by choosing what skins that we want at the end of the season or no?
Currently, we don't have plans to change how Victorious skins are currently earned. You'd only receive the current year's reward, and wouldn't be able to select which one you'd like.

This really sucks. I only play Morgana. She got me into game last November. I got gold this season - my first season. She is the only reason I play this game.  But because of this policy I'll never have Victorius Morgana even though 99.99% of the people who have the skin don't even play Morgana, just like I don't play Sivir. 

I wll not try to get gold next season or any after.  I have no reason to.  I only got gold this season to see if I could have gotten Victorious Morgana if I was playing in S4.

I have literally no incentive to get gold because the only ranked reward I will ever want is already gone, and that sucks.
If you only play ranked for a skin then you're right, you probably shouldn't play ranked.

> 
> We've been working to create more options for new players to collect something that's 'exclusive' such as the First Strike loading screens for the PROJECT skins.

I have this suggestion. Rather than limit victory skins (it's my belief that there should never be something completely unobtainable for the future, especially on content that can never be traded or otherwise sold like real world collector content such as trading cards, autographs, etc), why not reward people who get to those levels with special, permanent accolades on their profiles and loading screen splashes denoting which seasons they've achieved gold or higher in? Those accolades are better for showing off because they'd be always permanent and always visible, regardless of whether or not you use the skin. This is the same thing as Young Ryze - these skins are so rare now a days that the efforts and energies are wasted on updating this content since an extremely little minority will ever even see it, and it's more frustrating having super limited content that, as I mentioned before, is 100% never going to be obtained if you didn't achieve this very very specific milestone in this very specific time period. With the game's player base as big as it is now, and many more new players flooding in, it's more of a detriment to players who see hear of fabled content that they'll never see in game and disheartening to people who would pay money to obtain it. How many players from season 1 would actually be pissed if Triumphant Ryze was available to other players who get gold in season 6? If there was adequate accolades that denoted that they obtained that rank in those seasons, I cannot see why there would be upset from them, especially if they're now in such a tiny minority. I see more people getting upset that they'll never be able to see or obtain this cool content for their favorite champs than I do people getting upset about those skins being available in later seasons. 

From a gameplay perspective, it would actually be BETTER for the game if people could obtain past victory skins because they would play harder, take ranked more seriously, and devote themselves to winning if they know for a fact that there is a skin they absolutely want.

What about when you place Gold 5+ at the end of any season you get the chance to choose only one per end of season reward? Random thought. I joined LoL around patch 5.6ish

I think the people in plat & diamond would prefer to wait rather than have me on their team {{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

I love this idea and I feel the same about the Elise skin. Such a lovely design in comparison to the recent ones...
Except they'll never do that because it would be a negative experience for players that actually worked to get the skin in the respective season.
Well, that could be nice too, Thanks for having your thoughts added to his discussion!

This way you can't have more Victorious skins then the times you have gotten Gold 5+. That was kinda my idea on the thinking. Getting all at once didn't sound fair to me at least. I'd be willing to earn one Victorious skin each season this way, while not making those who have played longer and have gotten gold each season feeling cheated since they got their Season 1 - 5 Victorious skins the by placing Gold each time end of season came around.

And thanks. Sadly I didn't get into ranked this season. Not because I thought this looks bad http://ddragon.leagueoflegends.com/cdn/img/champion/splash/Sivir_8.jpg , which I don't. Its just that I was more afraid of the potential amount of rage that could be pointed at me if I got stuck jungling since it is probably my worst role. Still wouldn't mind finding someone who is willing to go over many basic (and somewhat advanced) tips and tricks for general jungling. It can be hard to try and farm jungle effectively AND make sure every lane isn't failing. Not to mention when I've had some lanes DEMAND for ganks constantly and then I'm under-leveled compared to the enemy jungler since they kept ~~asking~~ demanding for ganks that turn out unsuccessful. Sorry for the venting about my jungling woes.

Yeah, so, I guess Riot should be able to give those who earn a high ranking a chance to choose the skins that they would like best. You have a good point about getting of the skins at once, since it give the summoner another challenge so that they can earn another Victorious skins to their liking. Or maybe, they could get the Season that just ended with a chance to get another Victorious skin from seasons before. Like a 2 in 1 pack. Let me know about this guys!
It's an achievement, they won't re-release those skins because it marks the achievement of players in previous seasons, it's that simple mate.

So, I sent an email to Riot telling them that it is not fair for those who started League Of Legends and did not play during Season 1,2,3, and 4 that are in Gold and higher. They told me that if a lot of people like this way of League, they might consider doing it. Thanks for you reply!
While I'd like the ones I missed out on, I don't think it'd be fair to those that were there and achieved it.

Don't you think that those who were there have a lot of skins that we don't have? Like Championship Riven, PAX TF, Pax Sivir, and many more? Well, this is what you can get from Riot from being in Gold and higher. If Riot wants, they can give the skins if we get a higher rank next season with all of the new changes that is happening.

Championship Riven is set to return at in the future, possibly next year.  The PAX skins were made for the PAX Events, those should NEVER be re-released outside of those events (aka only available to the people that went to the events to get the codes).

Yeah, I know that, I was just saying that after like 2 years of complaints if the Championship Riven Skin, it might be coming out, and that maybe the Victorious skins could be available from Season 1-4, for those who recently joined and saw a skin that they liked.

Well , now mastery system IS développed , maybe we could have a system that could award gold +  players who main one of the champs who have a victorious skin , to get the victorious skin of their main champ if they manage to get like gold or maybe a little higher :o
Because I remember comming to LOL at the very end of season 4 and I immediatly enjoyed Morgana as a champion , so I started playing her . At the end of the year i saw that new Morgana up comming skin and i was so happy BUT i was only level 27 so I could not even play ranked yet and when i realised that i couldn't get that skin ever again I was destroyed even untill this day I feel bad that I don't have it as someone who is a Morgana main . Now , I understand the logic that it is a trophy, and i'm not asking RIOT to just sell it out . But I would really appreciate a new opportunity to get that skin . I already had problèmes with LOL and RIOT helped me very well , so please ... :c
I like this idea a lot. I'm still upset I haven't been around in season 3 when you could earn Victorious Elise. I'd trade my V. Morgana for that one if it was possible :(

I think there should be a way to make victorious skins avaliable for those who missed them(they could use these borders that are used for skins who lost their limited-status to mark the ones who got their victorious skin in a certain season).

Maybe they could make it so that the old skins can be purchased for rp by gold players.
No, not really? Where is the prestige...

I understand the concept that it's a trophy and there are people who love having things others dont because they worked for it
but
I think it would be a somewhat plausible idea for them to release a victorious skin every year but anyone who has obtained gold gets to pick ONE out of the pool. 
I'd love to have Janna and Morgana but this is my first ranked season and ill get maokai who ill never play. Im more than happy to get a free skin, yet i can see the reasong behind this post. Some choice in it would be nice. Do we deserve it? no, but it'd be cool none the less.
Maybe Challengers deserve to get every single one from season 1 to this one for the end of a season, but not gold. No way reaching such a low rank would make you eligible for THAT much free stuff

It sucks to be from Africa we are always last on the list with everything even out ping sucks the best ping we can receive is 160 ping nothing lower so i gameplay is just determined by predictions and which way the enemy will move or will do its harder for us to even get to get out of Silver 1{{champion:44}}

some skins should not come back.
 for rarity purposes. sorry

I don't think you should be able to chose what skin you want honestly I got my first victorious skin last season and I was so excited for it, and then it was sivir which was cool cause it was a champ i play, but it was not of the caliber of the other victorious skins. They have been dedicated to the game longer and have earned those skins, we all know getting gold can be a struggle with the amount of poorly skilled players in lower elos. I think if you didn't get the skins cause you didn't play that season it's unfortunate but it is not fair to those who earned them and like to show them off to people who didn't. I really hope to see another jungle victorious skin, I think a victorious vi would be pretty sweet

Stop asking for Victorious skins that represent season rewards. As the Rioter mentioned, they're like trophies, you didn't play back in the day that's your problem. There are several games that have things like this and when joining a game that gets order it's natural to have certain things permanently unobtainable due to reasons (Think World of Warcraft titles "Scarab Lord", "Argent Defender", "Server First Titles" + Countless other vanities/titles/mounts/etc).

This is the equivalent of asking for those kind of things because they were before your time or you didn't obtain them in time before they became unobtainable. WoW was just an easy example due to the countless things in it. Just like in other games with things like this, I enjoy people complement Victorious Jarvan/Janna whenever I use them, I think they updated Victorious Jarvan too, he looks much better than I remember.

To be honest, I'm not too concerned with getting the previous Victorious skins, mostly because it's the mark of getting to gold for that season, which I didn't do during those seasons, so I honestly don't deserve them.

I'd be more on board with having the PAX skins available again, but only through codes given at the PAX event, like before. It makes sense to me that they shouldn't just put those skins on the store, cause even PAX skins should require a lot of effort to get. But they shouldn't be impossible, and they already have a precedence of being distributed at PAX. So why not do it again? At least one more time?
Victorious Jarvan IV's splash art doesn't even have the colors of a Victorious skin... It'd be great if Riot used the Chinese version instead, problem solved {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

It's meant to be a one of a kind sort of thing. If you weren't in the game at the time or didn't reach that rank then NO you cannot have it. Like as much as I'd love to own Vict Janna, that's never gonna happen.  I do own my other fav being Vict Morg because I made it to gold in season 4, so I'm satisfied with at least that.

Since more and more people are starting to be interested in playing League Of Legends, should they have the opportunity to experience all of the skins that everyone else has and that they don't? Well, I know what you are saying, but would you wish you knew what League Of Legends was when it first came out with better computers to play?

Riot has already done that once with the formerly limited edition holiday skins. They shouldn't EVER do that to something like the Victorious skins because those are meant to be something truly special.

Those are for the holidays, you can get those within like 3 weeks time period. These are skins that are for those who achieve a high ranking though their hard working. Like above, they should be able to choose the skins that they would like to have for their hard working, or be giving all of the skins from Season before. Its not fair for those who did not know of League Of Legends before.

But again, they were once skins that were said to NEVER be re-released and then they changed it due to the higher increase of players over the years, however they shouldn't do that to every single category of skin just because there are an increase of players. Things like the Victorious skins should

A. Remain for people that reach gold or higher
B. Only be available for that season
Ok then, what about for at the end of seasons, they could choose the skins that they would prefer, or get that season skin with a chance to get a pick at previous victorious skins.

Giving them all out at once would be a little extreme, but allowing a choice would be the best way to go about it. People who "were there" and got them already still have more skins, but new people should have a chance to get skins that matter to them.

 These are supposed to be reward skins, and there isn't much reward in a forced option that may or may not appeal to you at all. (I don't hate Morgana like I do Sivir but I'd trade both of them for Janna.)

 Getting to gold should get you a reward, not a chance at a reward (a chance that you realistically have a very small chance of winning).
